name: The Restless Reef
description:
Welcome to The Restless Reef, a game that I have developed as part of my dissertation study at the University of the West of England, Bristol.

The motivation for The Restless Reef's development was the lack of existing serious games regarding marine health and conservation. My goal is to raise awareness to these topics through the use of this game and help in accelerating ocean protection.

Collect starfish that are hiding in a reef ecosystem to discover the dangers human impacts are having on our oceans.
